system.effect:
An elixir of mutagentic material and herbs which imparts a sustained burst of adrenaline. When imbibed, the Adrenal Elixir lowers the DC to stabilize the imbiber in a Death State by 5 and bolsters their chances of survival.
For the next 3 rounds, the target automatically succeeds Death Saves, though their Death Save penalty continues to rise. If imbibed while not in a Death State, the Adrenal Elixir allows the imbiber to ignore the penalties of being below their Wound Threshold for three rounds.
